title: ExCap Weapon Moveset Schema
description: The ExCap movesets can be created from scratch or be imported, Importing takes priority over making your own so choose carefully. You cannot do both.

import.description: Used whether to import any existing Epic Fight weapon types. You must use one or the other, you are unable to use both.

styles.description: A set of styles one uses from their imported animations, it must match the amount of styles that are in your weapon type.

parent.description: What the original Epic Fight weapon types are.

combo_attack.description: The basic combo attacks, the last two will be primarily for dash and jump attacks

weapon_passive.description: What weapon passive will be given to a style.

innate_skill.description: The weapon innate skill that will be assigned

revelation_attack.description: The ResourceLocation for the animation that does revelation attacks.

living_animations.description: The living motions that plays when holding the weapon, the schema is LivingMotion, AnimationPath

guard_motions.description: The custom guard motions that is required for custom block or parry attacks
